status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: iOS natively supports calling a selector for back button clicked events for things that need to happen immediately once a back button is clicked, most often a rapid UI change. For these types of things the close event takes too long and results in a glitchy UI.
fields.summary: iOS: NavWindow needs a back button clicked event
